name: Better WordPress Polldaddy Polls
author: Khang Minh

sections.description:
This plugin helps you add Polldaddy Polls to your WordPress website easily. BWP Polldaddy Polls focuses on the front end rather than the back end, i.e. you edit your polls on polldaddy.com and you choose how to show them on your website.

Demo

You can view a working instance of this plugin on the right sidebar of Better WordPress homepage.

Some Features

  • Simple, lightweight and easy to use
  • Allow you to update your polls manually or automatically using a configurable time settings
  • Offer SSL support for paid Polldaddy accounts
  • Display polls using widget
  • Display polls using shortcode (bwp-polldaddy)
  • Display polls using template functions (bwp_polldaddy)
  • Limit the number of polls to display
  • Sort polls based on IDs, creation date, numbers of responses, or sort randomly
  • WordPress Multi-site compatible

Visit Plugin’s Official Page for more information!

Please don’t forget to rate this plugin 5 shining stars if you like it, thanks!

Languages

  • This plugin is currently available only in English. Please help translate it!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the bwp-polldaddy folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress. After activation, you should see a menu of this plugin under Settings.
  3. Configure the plugin.
  4. Add polls to your site using either widget, shortcode (bwp-polldaddy), or template function (bwp_polldaddy()).
  5. Enjoy!

Visit Plugin’s Official Page for more information!

sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Enhance plugin workflow and add more poll stats
  • Enhance poll auto-update functionality
  • You can now force a manual update even when automatic update is enabled
  • The bwpdaddy shortcode has been deprecated in favor of bwp-polldaddy. The old shortcode will continue to work but is expected to be removed.
  • Implement proper SSL support
  • Other minor fixes and enhancements
  • WordPress 3.9 compatible.

1.0.2

  • Marked as WordPress 3.7 compatible.
  • Updated BWP Framework to fix a possible bug that causes BWP setting pages to go blank.
  • Fixed a possible bug that causes all requests made to Polldaddy’s server to fail.
  • Good news: ManageWP.com has become the official sponsor for BWP Polldaddy Polls – Read more.

1.0.1

  • Mark this plugin as compatible with WordPress 3.2.x.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
